name: This one Fight
description:
A small Pixel Art-Project became a game.

How?
First, there was the sprite sheet of the boss.
Then there was an animation.
Suddenly a Background happened, then the background effects.
Then a hero came to beat the boss.
Now they can fight.

Planned Updates
- Enhanced Sprites, Animations and Effects
- Sound and Music

The Final version will be Made for every Platform:
Windows (32 bit and 64 bit)
Linux
Mac OS
Web
Android
? maybe more

Maybe they also will be:
- Updated Fighting (buffs and debuffs, more attacks)
- Items
- more bosses or / and smaller enemies
- a new player character?
